title: Promise Day reveal button pink styling + label text update

requirements.summary: Restyle the Promise Day additional promise reveal button to an aesthetic pretty/dark pink (including hover/focus/active) while preserving readability and the romantic theme.
acceptanceCriteria: The button background appears as a clearly pink (pretty/dark pink) color in its default state (not coral).
Hover/focus/active states remain within a pink palette (e.g., slightly darker/lighter pink) and maintain sufficient contrast with the button text.
Button styling remains visually consistent with the existing romantic theme and does not introduce a blue/purple-dominant scheme.

file_operations.description: Introduce/adjust romantic pink color tokens (e.g., CSS variables) and any supporting utility styles needed so the reveal button can use a clearly pink palette across default/hover/focus/active states while keeping good text contrast.

Update the reveal Button styling classes to replace the current coral styling with the new romantic pink palette, including hover/focus-visible/active states and maintaining readability/romantic consistency. (Do not edit shadcn Button component under frontend/src/components/ui.)

requirements.summary: Change the additional promise reveal button label text to exactly: "because we love each other. Click me."
acceptanceCriteria: The button displays exactly this text (including punctuation and capitalization): "because we love each other. Click me."

file_operations.description: Replace the current conditional button label text with the exact required string: "because we love each other. Click me." Ensure the user-facing button text always matches exactly (including punctuation/capitalization) while keeping the existing reveal behavior intact.
